Unless I'm mistaken, the documentation (cantera-install.ppt) provides
the links you need.  Numeric python ('numpy') version 24.0 can be
found at:

   http://sourceforge.net/projects/numpy


and numarray for python 24 can be found at:

  
http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=1369&package_id=32367&release_id=329948

(it is the fourth link down).


Hope this helps,
Steven DeCaluwe



--- aperfectrider <jemiller@...> wrote:

> Where can I find and download Cantera154, or any older version?  I
> am 
> runnung Python23, and cantera155 requires Python24.  I would switch
> to 
> Python 24, but I could only find Numeric and Numarray for Python
> 23.
> 
> Thanks for any help you can offer.
>
